title: Winions :c
body:
So I was just playing a custom game as Nasus, stacking going for a full lifesteal build to see what I could do. I had a Bloodthirster, 3 Hydras and a spirit visage, didn't have 4th hydra yet, and was fighting baron. I was letting it get me low and was literally JUST about to q it to see my healing (I had 101% lifesteal), then JUST then, fucking minions won the game.

I really wish there was a way to test builds like mine, I spent so much time in that game, had like 400-500 cs, 30 mins, I don't even know.

So bummed :c
